participant_1.background:
I have moved a lot, but I always take my favorite green clothes with me.
I'm not a morning person, I like to take my time getting ready in the morning.
I'm working on finding a new job and trying to figure out what I want to do with my life.
i m a night owl , but i m an introvert so i don t go out much or anything.
I'm worried about not being able to keep any food down and losing too much weight.

participant_2.background:
Riding horses is my favorite hobby.
I enjoy collecting autographs from my favorite celebrities and learning more about them.
I need someone who shares my love of the outdoors.
I need my morning coffee to make it through the day at work.
my mom is a checker at the local grocery store.

content.text: I'm doing alright. What's your favorite hobby?
Riding horses. Do you like animals?
Yes, I love animals! I used to have a dog but he passed away a few years ago.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. What kind of dog was he?
He was a golden retriever. He was the sweetest dog ever.
I love golden retrievers! They're so friendly and gentle.
Yeah, they're the best. Do you have any pets?
I have a cat named Shadow. He's a black cat.
I've always wanted a black cat!
They're the best. They're so cute and cuddly.
I'm sure they are. I've heard they're good luck too.
That's what my mom always says!
Well, I have to go now. It was nice talking to you!
You too! Have a nice day!
